bossDialog: (A huge amount of bugs climb out of holes in the walls and floor and cluster together on one spot, forming the shape of a single much larger bug. They make a horrible noise and attack!)
(Frowning as you see a rather disgusting corpse near the treasure, you barely keep your lunch down as a huge Mite messily bursts out of it, clearly hungry for more!)
(You hear loud scuttling, and soon see one of the largest bugs you've ever seen hungrily running towards you!)

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures gain 10% more {STAT_speed} from stat-boosting effects.
cardBonuses.4: Your creatures gain 10% more {STAT_speed} from stat-boosting effects.
cardBonuses.7: Your creatures gain 10% more {STAT_speed} from stat-boosting effects.

master.dialog: Did you know that Mites are notorious for burrowing into other creatures' ears while they're sleeping? Yeah. They even lay eggs in their brains. Pretty cool, right? Anyway, let's duel!
master.name: Aliphar

name: Mite
